summary: A man returns to his sublet apartment to find the previous tenants, three offbeat young women, still in residence, under the mistaken belief that they have the apartment until the end of New Year's Day.
cast: Maggie Wheeler|Gwen Welles|Melanie Winter|Henry Jaglom|David Duchovny|Milos Forman|Michael Emil|Donna Germain|Harvey Miller|Irene Moore|James E. dePriest|Tracy Reiner|Robert Hallak|Katherine Wallach|Paul Dark|Adam Guettel|James Hurt|Kristina Loggia|Robert Morton|Rodger Parsons
keywords: home video|moving out|moving in|compassion|in love with best friend
title: New Year's Day
